sourcesContent:
// KeyFeatures.js import React from 'react'; import './component-styles/KeyFeatures.css'; // Custom CSS for key features import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faDatabase, faGavel, faMobileAlt } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; const KeyFeatures = ({ theme }) => {     return (      
       

Key Features

       
                   
           
                         
           

NLP & Legal Database

           

              Interprets incident details and connects to legal databases for relevant laws.            

         
                   
           
                         
           

Unified Platform

           

              Centralized repository of updated laws with easy search by act, section, or keyword.            

         
                   
           
                         
           

Available on All Platforms

           

              Web, Android, iOS, Windows, and Mac for seamless access across devices.            

         
                 
     
    );   }; export default KeyFeatures;
